Delme Radcliffe, Italy.G.I.G.SWar Office.Handed in 4.0 p.m. 22.11.17.Received 10.30 p.m. 22.11.17.740.Situation: Morning 22nd November. 3rd Army. Situation unchanged.4th Army. Report received up to 6 a.m. Kov. 22nd on yesterday's fighting between Piave and Monte Pertica indicates that three enemy attacks made in force against M. Pertica and up the Val Gesilla to nest of MrFertica were repulsed decisively, Enemy succeeded in driving Italians from. M. Font ana Central c a and line now runs through M. Fontanel and M. Solarolo.1st Army. A local attack on morning of Hov. 21st against Italian trenches about S. Marino in Brenta sector was repulsed with heavy loss, 29 prisoners captured and 60 enemy dead loft on ground-
